topics.author: 52f0834d63687261cba90300

topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54cc707663687253282d0300#post_54cc707663687253282d0300
I just wonder how effective the real thing really were in war. In all YouTube vids, they appear to be really weak. True that they are weakers than regular crossbows. But, if they were used in war, they should be able to kill or wound a human right? It is said that they dipped the darts in poison to increase the chance of kill. But the weapon doesn't look like it has much stopping power. Its main power is its ability to rapid fire, and maybe scare off attackers.
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

topics.body:
Hey guys, do you know any fanfics where one of the Mane Six disappears and a few years later, reappears but acts a lot different?

I read one where Twilight disappears only to come back during her anniversary a few years later as battle-hardened space marine.

The idea is interesting itself.
